bio.p: Quanzeng Wang received his PhD in chemical and biomolecular engineering from the University of Maryland at College Park in 2009. Since then, he has been a scientist at the Center for Devices and Radiological Health of the U.S. FDA. His research interests include image quality, remote vital signs detection, medical thermometry and thermography, optical spectroscopy and imaging, tissue optics, computational biophotonics, and optical diagnostics.
